sqlMap.select: SELECT ofc_cd, trf_cur_cd, agent_stmt_rmk, locl_stmt_rmk FROM tb_ofc WHERE ofc_cd = (SELECT pre_fix FROM tb_seq WHERE seq_type = 'SYS_OFC_CD')

/* PfmAccAccountingSQL.xml > searchAgentCrDbList */ SELECT inv.inv_seq, idt.inv_no, bl.ref_no, CASE WHEN inv.sell_buy_tp_cd = 'C' THEN idt.bal_amt * -1 ELSE idt.bal_amt END AS bal_amt, bl.bl_no, SUBSTRING(bl.etd_dt_tm,1,8) AS etd_dt_tm, SUBSTRING(bl.eta_dt_tm,1,8) AS eta_dt_tm , bl.imp_ref_no FROM tb_inv inv JOIN tb_inv_dtl idt ON idt.inv_seq = inv.inv_seq AND idt.delt_flg = 'N' JOIN tb_trdp agt ON agt.trdp_cd = inv.trdp_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_frt frt ON frt.inv_seq = idt.inv_seq AND frt.delt_flg = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_intg_bl bl ON bl.intg_bl_seq = frt.intg_bl_seq AND bl.delt_flg = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_oth_sales ots ON ots.oth_seq = frt.oth_seq
WHERE inv.inv_seq = idt.inv_seq AND inv.trdp_cd = #trdp_cd# AND inv.sell_buy_tp_cd IN ('D','C') AND inv.delt_flg = 'N' AND idt.delt_flg = 'N' AND inv.inv_dept_cd IN ($dpt_tp$)
AND idt.inv_aply_curr_cd = #curr_cd#
AND CASE WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd = 'OTH' THEN ots.ofc_cd ELSE bl.ref_ofc_cd END = #ofc_cd#
AND agt.trdp_cd = #trdp_cd#
AND dbo.FC_ISNULL(agt.acct_cd,'') != ''
AND agt.acct_cd = #acct_cd#
AND idt.bal_amt != 0
AND idt.bal_amt = 0
AND idt.inv_post_dt BETWEEN #per_strdt# AND #per_enddt#
AND CASE WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd = 'OTH' THEN DBO.FC_ISNULL(ots.etd_dt_tm,idt.inv_post_dt) ELSE DBO.FC_ISNULL(SUBSTRING(bl.etd_dt_tm,1,8),idt.inv_post_dt) END BETWEEN #per_strdt# AND #per_enddt#
AND idt.inv_dt BETWEEN #per_strdt# AND #per_enddt#
AND CASE WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd = 'OTH' THEN DBO.FC_ISNULL(ots.eta_dt_tm,idt.inv_post_dt) ELSE DBO.FC_ISNULL(SUBSTRING(bl.eta_dt_tm,1,8),idt.inv_post_dt) END BETWEEN #per_strdt# AND #per_enddt#
GROUP BY inv.inv_seq, idt.inv_no, bl.ref_no, inv.sell_buy_tp_cd, idt.bal_amt, bl.bl_no, bl.etd_dt_tm, bl.eta_dt_tm, bl.imp_ref_no ORDER BY idt.inv_no ASC

/* PfmAccAccountingSQL.xml > searchAgentStatementPrtList */ SELECT inval.trdp_cd, inval.inv_seq, inval.curr_cd, inval.acct_cd , inval.sell_buy_tp_cd, inval.intg_bl_seq, inval.oth_seq
FROM(
SELECT
agt.trdp_cd, MAX(agt.locl_nm) AS locl_nm,
agt.acct_cd AS trdp_cd, '' AS locl_nm,
idt.inv_seq, idt.inv_aply_curr_cd AS curr_cd, agt.acct_cd,
CASE WHEN inv.sell_buy_tp_cd = 'C' AND inv.inv_dept_cd NOT IN ('OTH') AND (SELECT COUNT(xinv.inv_seq) FROM tb_frt xfrt, tb_inv_dtl xidt, tb_inv xinv WHERE xfrt.intg_bl_seq = bl.intg_bl_seq AND xfrt.inv_seq = xidt.inv_seq AND xidt.inv_seq = xinv.inv_seq AND xinv.sell_buy_tp_cd = 'S' AND xidt.bal_amt != 0) != 0 THEN 'N' WHEN inv.sell_buy_tp_cd = 'C' AND inv.inv_dept_cd IN ('OTH') AND (SELECT COUNT(xinv.inv_seq) FROM tb_frt xfrt, tb_inv_dtl xidt, tb_inv xinv WHERE xfrt.oth_seq = ots.oth_seq AND xfrt.inv_seq = xidt.inv_seq AND xidt.inv_seq = xinv.inv_seq AND xinv.sell_buy_tp_cd = 'S' AND xidt.bal_amt != 0) != 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS chk_flg,
CASE WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd IN ('AIM','AIH') THEN 1 WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd IN ('AOM','AOH') THEN 2 WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd IN ('SIM','SIH') THEN 3 WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd IN ('SOM','SOH') THEN 4 WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd IN ('OTH') THEN 5 ELSE 9 END AS rank_no
, inv.sell_buy_tp_cd , bl.intg_bl_seq , ots.oth_seq
FROM tb_inv inv
JOIN tb_inv_dtl idt ON idt.inv_seq = inv.inv_seq AND idt.delt_flg = 'N'
JOIN tb_trdp agt ON agt.trdp_cd = inv.trdp_cd
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_frt frt ON frt.inv_seq = inv.inv_seq AND frt.delt_flg = 'N'
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_intg_bl bl ON bl.intg_bl_seq = frt.intg_bl_seq
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_oth_sales ots ON ots.oth_seq = frt.oth_seq
WHERE inv.delt_flg = 'N' AND inv.sell_buy_tp_cd IN ('D','C') AND inv.inv_dept_cd IN ($dpt_tp$)
AND idt.inv_aply_curr_cd = #curr_cd#
AND CASE WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd = 'OTH' THEN ots.ofc_cd ELSE bl.ref_ofc_cd END = #ofc_cd#
AND agt.trdp_cd = #trdp_cd#
AND dbo.FC_ISNULL(agt.acct_cd,'') != ''
AND agt.acct_cd = #acct_cd#
AND idt.bal_amt != 0
AND idt.bal_amt = 0
AND idt.inv_post_dt BETWEEN #per_strdt# AND #per_enddt#
AND CASE WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd = 'OTH' THEN DBO.FC_ISNULL(ots.etd_dt_tm,idt.inv_post_dt) ELSE DBO.FC_ISNULL(SUBSTRING(bl.etd_dt_tm,1,8),idt.inv_post_dt) END BETWEEN #per_strdt# AND #per_enddt#
AND idt.inv_dt BETWEEN #per_strdt# AND #per_enddt#
AND CASE WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd = 'OTH' THEN DBO.FC_ISNULL(ots.eta_dt_tm,idt.inv_post_dt) ELSE DBO.FC_ISNULL(SUBSTRING(bl.eta_dt_tm,1,8),idt.inv_post_dt) END BETWEEN #per_strdt# AND #per_enddt#
GROUP BY
agt.trdp_cd, agt.acct_cd,
agt.acct_cd,
idt.inv_seq, idt.inv_aply_curr_cd, inv.inv_dept_cd, bl.intg_bl_seq, ots.oth_seq, inv.sell_buy_tp_cd, idt.bal_amt ,bl.intg_bl_seq ,ots.oth_seq
UNION ALL
SELECT agt.trdp_cd, MAX(agt.locl_nm) AS locl_nm, idt.inv_seq, idt.inv_aply_curr_cd AS curr_cd, '' AS acct_cd,
CASE WHEN inv.sell_buy_tp_cd = 'C' AND inv.inv_dept_cd NOT IN ('OTH') AND (SELECT COUNT(xinv.inv_seq) FROM tb_frt xfrt, tb_inv_dtl xidt, tb_inv xinv WHERE xfrt.intg_bl_seq = bl.intg_bl_seq AND xfrt.inv_seq = xidt.inv_seq AND xidt.inv_seq = xinv.inv_seq AND xinv.sell_buy_tp_cd = 'S' AND xidt.bal_amt != 0) != 0 THEN 'N' WHEN inv.sell_buy_tp_cd = 'C' AND inv.inv_dept_cd IN ('OTH') AND (SELECT COUNT(xinv.inv_seq) FROM tb_frt xfrt, tb_inv_dtl xidt, tb_inv xinv WHERE xfrt.oth_seq = ots.oth_seq AND xfrt.inv_seq = xidt.inv_seq AND xidt.inv_seq = xinv.inv_seq AND xinv.sell_buy_tp_cd = 'S' AND xidt.bal_amt != 0) != 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS chk_flg,
CASE WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd IN ('AIM','AIH') THEN 1 WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd IN ('AOM','AOH') THEN 2 WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd IN ('SIM','SIH') THEN 3 WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd IN ('SOM','SOH') THEN 4 WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd IN ('OTH') THEN 5 ELSE 9 END AS rank_no
, inv.sell_buy_tp_cd , bl.intg_bl_seq , ots.oth_seq
FROM tb_inv inv
JOIN tb_inv_dtl idt ON idt.inv_seq = inv.inv_seq AND idt.delt_flg = 'N'
JOIN tb_trdp agt ON agt.trdp_cd = inv.trdp_cd
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_frt frt ON frt.inv_seq = inv.inv_seq AND frt.delt_flg = 'N'
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_intg_bl bl ON bl.intg_bl_seq = frt.intg_bl_seq
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_oth_sales ots ON ots.oth_seq = frt.oth_seq
WHERE inv.delt_flg = 'N' AND inv.sell_buy_tp_cd IN ('D','C') AND inv.inv_dept_cd IN ($dpt_tp$) AND agt.acct_cd IS NULL
AND idt.inv_aply_curr_cd = #curr_cd#
AND CASE WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd = 'OTH' THEN ots.ofc_cd ELSE bl.ref_ofc_cd END = #ofc_cd#
AND idt.bal_amt != 0
AND idt.bal_amt = 0
AND idt.inv_post_dt BETWEEN #per_strdt# AND #per_enddt#
AND CASE WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd = 'OTH' THEN DBO.FC_ISNULL(ots.etd_dt_tm,idt.inv_post_dt) ELSE DBO.FC_ISNULL(SUBSTRING(bl.etd_dt_tm,1,8),idt.inv_post_dt) END BETWEEN #per_strdt# AND #per_enddt#
AND idt.inv_dt BETWEEN #per_strdt# AND #per_enddt#
AND CASE WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd = 'OTH' THEN DBO.FC_ISNULL(ots.eta_dt_tm,idt.inv_post_dt) ELSE DBO.FC_ISNULL(SUBSTRING(bl.eta_dt_tm,1,8),idt.inv_post_dt) END BETWEEN #per_strdt# AND #per_enddt#
GROUP BY agt.trdp_cd, idt.inv_seq, idt.inv_aply_curr_cd, inv.inv_dept_cd, bl.intg_bl_seq, ots.oth_seq, inv.sell_buy_tp_cd, idt.bal_amt , bl.intg_bl_seq , ots.oth_seq
)inval
WHERE inval.chk_flg = #locl_rcv_flg#
ORDER BY inval.locl_nm, inval.trdp_cd, inval.curr_cd, inval.rank_no
ORDER BY inval.acct_cd, inval.locl_nm, inval.trdp_cd, inval.curr_cd, inval.rank_no

/* PfmAccAccountingSQL.xml > searchLocalStatementPrtList */ SELECT cust.trdp_cd, cust.trdp_cd+'^^'+idt.inv_aply_curr_cd AS curr_cd, CASE WHEN inv.sell_buy_tp_cd = 'S' THEN idt.inv_seq ELSE '' END AS inv_seq ,bl.intg_bl_seq ,ots.oth_seq ,wms.wm_doc_seq FROM tb_inv inv
JOIN tb_inv_dtl idt ON idt.inv_seq = inv.inv_seq AND idt.delt_flg = 'N'
JOIN tb_trdp cust ON cust.trdp_cd = inv.trdp_cd
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_frt frt ON frt.inv_seq = inv.inv_seq AND frt.delt_flg = 'N'
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_intg_bl bl ON bl.intg_bl_seq = frt.intg_bl_seq
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_oth_sales ots ON ots.oth_seq = frt.oth_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_wm_doc_mst wms ON wms.wm_doc_seq = frt.wms_seq WHERE inv.delt_flg = 'N'
AND idt.inv_aply_curr_cd = #curr_cd#
AND inv.inv_dept_cd IN ($dpt_tp$)
AND inv.trdp_cd = #trdp_cd#
AND CASE WHEN inv.inv_dept_cd = 'OTH' THEN ots.ofc_cd ELSE bl.ref_ofc_cd END = #ofc_cd#
AND idt.inv_post_dt <= #per_dt#
AND idt.inv_due_dt <= #per_dt#
AND idt.inv_dt <= #per_dt#
AND idt.inv_post_dt BETWEEN #per_strdt# AND #per_enddt#
AND idt.inv_due_dt BETWEEN #per_strdt# AND #per_enddt#
AND idt.inv_dt BETWEEN #per_strdt# AND #per_enddt#
AND ( inv.sell_buy_tp_cd = 'S' OR (inv.sell_buy_tp_cd = 'B' AND inv.air_sea_clss_cd != 'G') )
AND inv.sell_buy_tp_cd = 'S'
AND inv.sell_buy_tp_cd = 'B' AND inv.air_sea_clss_cd != 'G'
AND idt.bal_amt != 0
AND CASE WHEN inv.sell_buy_tp_cd = 'S' THEN 'Y' ELSE idt.buy_inv_rcv END = 'Y'
GROUP BY cust.trdp_cd, cust.locl_nm, idt.inv_seq, inv.sell_buy_tp_cd, idt.inv_aply_curr_cd ,bl.intg_bl_seq ,ots.oth_seq ,wms.wm_doc_seq ORDER BY cust.locl_nm, cust.trdp_cd, idt.inv_aply_curr_cd, inv_seq

SELECT slp.curr_cd as curr_cd ,slp.inv_post_mm as aply_fm_dt ,0 as rate FROM ( SELECT inval.inv_curr_cd AS curr_cd ,substring(inval.inv_post_dt,1,6) as inv_post_mm ,inval.inv_post_dt as inv_post_dt FROM ( SELECT frt.inv_curr_cd, frt.inv_post_dt, (CASE WHEN gcd.gl_type IN ('IN','OI') THEN frt.credit - frt.debit ELSE frt.debit - frt.credit END) AS amt FROM ( SELECT frt.inv_curr_cd, frt.inv_post_dt, (CASE WHEN frt.sell_buy_tp_cd = 'S' THEN (SELECT gl_cd_rev FROM tb_frt_cd WHERE frt_cd = frt.frt_cd) WHEN frt.sell_buy_tp_cd = 'B' THEN (SELECT gl_cd_cost FROM tb_frt_cd WHERE frt_cd = frt.frt_cd) WHEN frt.sell_buy_tp_cd IN ('D','C') THEN (SELECT gl_cd_prnr FROM tb_frt_cd WHERE frt_cd = frt.frt_cd) END) AS gl_cd, (CASE WHEN frt.SELL_BUY_TP_CD = 'B' THEN frt.inv_amt WHEN frt.SELL_BUY_TP_CD = 'C' THEN frt.cr_amt ELSE 0 END) AS debit, (CASE WHEN frt.sell_buy_tp_cd IN ('S','D') THEN frt.inv_amt ELSE 0 END) AS credit FROM tb_frt frt WHERE 1=1 AND frt.inv_post_dt BETWEEN #per_strdt# AND #per_enddt#
AND frt.rgst_ofc_cd = #ofc_cd#
AND ISNULL(frt.delt_flg, 'N') != 'Y' AND ISNULL(frt.inv_seq, '') != '' ) frt, tb_gl_cd gcd WHERE frt.gl_cd = gcd.gl_cd AND gcd.gl_type IN ('IN','CO','EX','OI','OE','IT') ) inval WHERE inval.amt != 0 GROUP BY inval.inv_curr_cd, inval.inv_post_dt ) slp LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_finc_perf_xcrt fixc_mm ON fixc_mm.fm_curr_cd = slp.curr_cd AND fixc_mm.dt_clss_cd = 'M' AND substring(fixc_mm.aply_fm_dt,1,6) = slp.inv_post_mm AND fixc_mm.delt_flg = 'N' AND fixc_mm.to_curr_cd = '$curr_cd$' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_finc_perf_xcrt fixc_dd ON fixc_dd.fm_curr_cd = slp.curr_cd AND fixc_dd.dt_clss_cd = 'D' AND fixc_dd.aply_fm_dt = slp.inv_post_dt AND fixc_dd.delt_flg = 'N' AND fixc_dd.to_curr_cd = '$curr_cd$' WHERE ISNULL(fixc_dd.xch_rt_ut,fixc_mm.xch_rt_ut) IS NULL AND slp.curr_cd != '$curr_cd$' GROUP BY slp.curr_cd, slp.inv_post_mm ORDER BY slp.curr_cd, slp.inv_post_mm
